posts.body: 8chan irc has been suggesting this board

Honestly they are pushing this to an extreme and the blowback will be worse than they can imagine. We're now completely without moderation oversight here, something that could have happened a long time ago if we truly wanted it but we were content to enjoy ourselves on a centralized board with (((questionable))) administration and moderation. They pushed us to this. All we want to do is post nazi anime girl memes in peace. Now it's time for war. Awoo

>>19149d31-d96d-45f2-957e-70aade707524
##8chan not #8chan

We all left #8 a long time ago for double #

>>ad956f19-b57d-4d8f-8631-99f27b179a29
OTR is better than nothing but it's not the end all be all. OMEMO is actually a lot better in many ways.

Funny enough, it's entirely possible to use OTR on discord. Using something like libpurple with discord integration, it's possible to connect discord to pidgin or even bitlbee and use OTR and a regular irc client to talk on discord. Hell, you can even use fishlem like the old days :D

>>5349647b-880e-49d1-9dbf-9f926fb16bef
Eukodal and Pervitin were essential to the war effort, newfag

Spun up another laptop specifically to seed the full 08 site. Not everyone is able to do so, therefore I feel it's part of my duty to help keep us afloat. I hope more anons will do this as well, I am using a VPN so hopefully any illegal content that I accidentally upload won't bite me in the ass too hard, and the disk is fully encrypted so even if I am raided here's hoping the bastards won't have anything.

Godspeed gentlemen

>>9788374f-8989-4cb7-adf8-05592ed84ac1
We're forked from millchan now, and not following upstream directly.
I only see the following JS files, neither of which are minified in my dev tools when reloading this thread. Please post the actual minified JS in question for analysis

>>e8d39f62-2b58-4969-95d1-1b593c52321b
According to Board Owner, 08 is a millchan fork. There are additional features, bugfixes, and changes to the forked code which are not present in Millchan, as well as bugs in the current version of Millchan which are not present in 08.

>>d71afc02-eef1-41c6-9267-8ebc5353b25c
If you don't encrypt your HDD then anyone can simply place a file on your disk and then blame you for it anyways. Encrypt your shit yourself

https://pastebin.com/cQc4sSgM

Here is a un-uglified version of the file in question, with function names restored
Dear Board Owner, can you please allow .zip and .txt file upload? Thanks

>>2b5bb954-6124-4a84-81a5-e75629f05153
I would be willing to provide NordVPN accounts to those in need who want to seed. If this sounds like something you want to do lets figure out the best way to communicate, perhaps tox?

>>1c39d0ed-617e-4543-af38-494dd5ad7a91
I pulled it out of developer tools, there were 2 versions but one didnt want to unminify and i spent maybe 3 minutes on it

This is not a 'no brainer' suggestion. THe board owner has made modifications to millchan and said that the upstream version has regression bugs that are solved in our 08chan version, namely muted posters not always being actually muted. 

Do not blindly follow suggestions to forcibly modify your board software. It is not a "update", but a seperate version of the code with more differences than just bug fixes and features. 

I have seen a lot of people suggesting that the board owner is simply asleep at the wheel but If you actually read the sticky you can see why this is not the case.

posts.subject: Welcome back homies
posts.body:
Long time /i/ user here, let's get this shit back off the ground. Expect general hacking information threads, suggestions on how to improve OPSEC and other proactive defensive measures, as well as offensive cyber security tutorials, advice, techniques, and reference information. 

Use this board to get organized and commit acts of cyber terrorism and r activism. Keep it technical, if you want to organize an operation please do it off board through a (as yet to be determined) safe realtime chat group. I am preferable to TOX protocol.
